activity_differential: dogs sniffing and moving along sidewalk
dogs interacting and moving near each other
description: Three small dogs are exploring and sniffing around a sidewalk and grassy area near a road. The dogs move independently, occasionally approaching or moving away from each other, and are engaged in foraging-like behavior. The camera slowly pans to follow the dogs' movement along the sidewalk.
